recipePage.noMaterials: No materials listed in the scroll.

micro.effects: Mild relief of pain and other symptoms (tremors, crisis, stress). Very gentle relaxation.

low.profile: Occasional consumers. Patients with persistent symptoms.
low.effects: Disappearance of most symptoms. Mild euphoria. Some discoordination may appear.

medium.profile: Frequent consumers. Patients with persistent symptoms.
medium.effects: You no longer remember what was hurting. Euphoria, creativity, silly laughter. Helps with falling asleep.

high.profile: Experienced consumers. Patients with high tolerance to THC and/or CBD.
high.effects: Euphoria, slight short-term amnesia, talkativeness. If not accustomed, adverse effects may appear.

heavy.profile: Brave hearts. Patients with very severe symptoms.
heavy.effects: You'll likely be out of action for several hours. You won't even know your own name. Warning: nausea and tachycardia may occur.

home.potencyText: The potency of your edibles depends entirely on the strength and quantity of your infused oil or butter. These recipes are guidelines. Please visit our
home.potencyText2: to learn how to calculate and adjust dosage for your personal needs.
home.statsText: Browse our collection of potent recipes and discover the perfect infusion for your next session.
home.noRecipesFound: NO RECIPES FOUND IN THIS CATEGORY

ingredients.subtitle: A curated compendium of
ingredients.subtitle2: , mystical herbs, and the essence of the pixelated wild.
ingredients.proTipText: Some ingredients are rarer than others! Look for the
ingredients.proTipText2: tag for ingredients that can only be found during a Blood Moon or in the deepest parts of the pixel forest.

calculator.title: DOSAGE CALCULATOR
calculator.subtitle: Plan your potion's potency before you brew.
calculator.thcHint: Average flower is ~15-20%. Top shelf is 25%+.
calculator.yieldTooltip: Not all active essence is extracted from the plant. Home infusions typically extract 60-80%.

ingredientDetail.noteText: Best harvested during a waxing moon. This component is highly reactive when mixed with Liquid Spirit or Inferno Salts.

decarb.title: DECARBOXYLATION GUIDE
decarb.whatIsItText: Raw botanical herb contains RAW ESSENCE, which is not active. Activation is the process of using heat to turn RAW ESSENCE into ACTIVE ESSENCE, the compound that provides the 'magic'. Without this step, your edibles will have very little effect.
decarb.step1: Break: Break your flower into small pieces (don't grind too fine).
decarb.step2: Bake: Spread on a baking tray with parchment paper.
decarb.step3: Heat: Place in the oven at 110°C - 120°C (230°F - 250°F).
decarb.step4: Time: Bake for 30 to 45 minutes until light brown.
decarb.warning: CRITICAL: If you skip this, you are just eating expensive grass!
decarb.proTip: Pro Tip: Cover the tray with aluminum foil to minimize the smell.
